mapper.select: SELECT * FROM words ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM words WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO words (english, chinese, pronunciation, category, difficulty, audio_url, example_sentence) VALUES (#{english}, #{chinese}, #{pronunciation}, #{category}, #{difficulty}, #{audioUrl}, #{exampleSentence})
mapper.update: UPDATE words SET english = #{english}, chinese = #{chinese}, pronunciation = #{pronunciation}, category = #{category}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, audio_url = #{audioUrl}, example_sentence = #{exampleSentence} WHERE id = #{id}
